ca.mcgill.ecse211.controller

Class RobotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.controller.RobotController

  • public class RobotController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves to control the robot's motors
    Author:
    Jeffrey Leung
